author: Special Correspondent
text: Criticising the delay in government formation in Jammu and Kashmir by the Peoples Democratic Party president Mehbooba Mufti, the National Conference on Sunday termed it “contemptuous attempt to test the patience of the people and called the PDP’s alliance with the BJP “as Mufti Mohammad Sayeed’s final and definitive political legacy.”
title: ‘An attempt to test people’s patience’
